Kalasha People: Shrouded in Myth & Mystery, Unraveling a Dark Reality as a Minority! Syed Gul Kalash​

Welcome to "The Northern Podcast" with your host Imran Noshad Khan. In this episode, we dive deep into the rich history and origins of the Kalash people with our esteemed guest, Syed Gul Kalash. Explore the genetic past, vibrant festivals, and cultural background of the Kalash Valley. Syed Gul shares insights on the current tourism situation, shedding light on the challenges faced by the Kalash people. From the troubling treatment by tourists to the preservation of Kalashi culture, join us for a compelling conversation. Stay tuned for an eye-opening discussion on gender roles, the education system, and the disappearing cultures across different states of Pakistan. Don't miss this thought-provoking episode as we unravel the realities and experiences of the Kalash people.
